DOC.brief_summary: Following obesity surgery gastric bypass (GBP) patients usually lose more than 50% of their former obesity within a relatively short time (~ 2 years). But knowledge about the underlying psychological and biological mechanisms of decline in body weight, however, is still lacking. This project intends to investigate whether obesity surgery is associated with patients' cognitive ability and / or gene expression and metabolomics.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Gastric Bypass Surgery on Cognition and Genetics
